name: I can't spare Kumakku!
description:
Fute&Kuma have come this year too!!!
A big row between the glutton two...

Why did you eat my share of the udon, Kumakku???
Mr.FutePen, I'm sorry... I couldn't stop eating it...

Kumakku, I never spare you this time!!!
I'm sorry, Mr.FutePen...

Having said sorry, Kumakku counterattacks this time, too...
Is he really feeling sorry???

Launch shots by touching!!! Going through the complicated stages, give damage to Kumakku and win the fight!!!

Various kinds of game modes, Solo, Watch, Local match-up, World match-up.
Anytime, anywhere, with anyone, you can play the game.
You can send and receive messages in the game.
